content: begin with the round on the chart that comes after the row you ended with on the cuff/leg n2 with a free needle work across 18 instep sts following chart begin with the round on the chart that comes after the row you ended with on the cuff/leg n3 with free needle pick up and knit from row below the first heel st to prevent a hole with same needle pick up 16 sts along side of the heel and work across remaining heel sts shape gusset round 1 decrease round n1 work to 3 sts from end k2tog k1 n2 instep work chart n3 instep work chart n4 k1 ssk work to end round 2 work even repeat rnds 1 and 2 until there are 72 sts remaining foot continue working in rnds until foot measures approximately 2 less than desired length from base of heel toe round 1 n1 sole work to last 3 sts k2tog k1 n2 instep k1 ssk work to end n3 instep work to last 3 sts k2tog k1 n4 sole k1 ssk complete round round 2 work even repeat rnds 1 and 2 until 48 total sts remain work decrease round only until 20 sts remain finishing work sts on n1 slip sts from n4 to opposite end of n1 slip sts from n3 onto n2 holding two needles together graft sts using kitchener stitch weave in ends work second sock _______________________________________________________________________ if you share this pattern please give credit a link back to the website at www theyarnbin com is appreciated you are free to sell any socks that you create using this pattern if you feel inclined to donate a portion of those profits to the yarn bin or one of our favored charities i wouldn t complain ☺ by tonya bangart ©2012
